name: Lexalizer
description:
Lexalizer finds the best moves for your Scrabble games in seconds. Can be used as an extra player in your Scrabble game. Also valuable for training (or cheating!).

** Optical Recognition **
Lets you load a game from a screen shot from many of the popular apps, so that you don't have to enter it manually.

** Game Designs **
Several game designs are supported, including Words With Friends, Lexulous, Wordfeud, Wordsmith, WordWise, Wordscraper and Words By Post.

** Dictionaries **
Multiple official dictionaries are available to pick from: SOWPODS, ENABLE, ODS4, ODS5 (French), CSW, YAWL, US English, Dutch and Italian.

** Strategy Evaluation **
Available to help you determine the best move to ensure victory, rather than just the highest scoring turn.

** Saved Games **
Game saving lets you track multiple games, whilst your current game is automatically remembered.

A network connection is required in order to obtain solutions. There is currently no synchronization of saved games between the application and scrabulizer.com account.
